cab.content: 1 317^ . This Document is thePrgp^bf,lJ iverniiioiu.is C:t;:-mmo(P4781),1;JyVom Viceroy, 17th June .1920,(Received 18th, 4 p.m.)J 757 S. It is reported from Mussoorie that the Afghan delegates have lately receivedmews of a serious, hut abortive, conspiracy at Kabul in favour of Inayatulla The news seems to have caused them great consternation. ' This may be an explanation of the reports (of) AmanuhYs assassination, of which there is no confirmation.
